item.title: Just messing around
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“blitz_9100, post:2, topic:166336”]thats a pretty good code but you really only need a ring around the begining and end of the code like this…

if (itemUsed == 1315 && useWith == 1777) {
deleteItem(1315, getItemSlot(1315), 1);
deleteItem(1777, getItemSlot(1777), 1);
addItem(6818, 1)
addSkillXP(30000, 12); 
}

thats a interesting thing because its almost what rs did to make their bowsword but they used a slender blade(6817) instead of mith 2 hander,but thats a nice secret but hope people forget before you host your server[/quote]
Actually, he is aloud to use parentheses as many times as he wishes. If he finds it cleaner and easier to read, than he is aloud to use them.

Read full topic

item.title: Just messing around
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

thats a pretty good code but you really only need a ring around the begining and end of the code like this…

if (itemUsed == 1315 && useWith == 1777) {
deleteItem(1315, getItemSlot(1315), 1);
deleteItem(1777, getItemSlot(1777), 1);
addItem(6818, 1)
addSkillXP(30000, 12); 
}

thats a interesting thing because its almost what rs did to make their bowsword but they used a slender blade(6817) instead of mith 2 hander,but thats a nice secret but hope people forget before you host your server

Read full topic

if ((itemUsed == 1315) && (useWith == 1777)) { deleteItem(1315, getItemSlot(1315), 1); deleteItem(1777, getItemSlot(1777), 1); addItem(6818, 1) addSkillXP(30000, 12); }

its hidden in my game …But i guess ill reveal…

Use a mithril 2h on a bowstring to get Bow-Sword lol…Gives 30k exp to crafting…
